abstract: Nate Chinen reviews performance by Kenny Wheeler and his quartet at the Jazz Standard, as part of the Festival of New Trumpet Music.
snippet: Kenny Wheeler was honored at the Festival of New Trumpet Music, and he showed why.
lead_paragraph: Kenny Wheeler was honored at the Festival of New Trumpet Music, and he showed why.

headline.main: An Influence And Songs That Grow On You
headline.print_headline: An Influence And Songs That Grow On You
headline.seo: Kenny Wheeler at Festival of New Trumpet Music - Review
